description: Zed Business Layer - Facade: The method Spryker\Zed\ProductReviewCollector\Business\ProductReviewCollectorFacade::runSearchProductReviewCollector() has 2 factory calls and violates the rule "Every Facade method should have no more than one factory call.".

Zed Business Layer - Facade: The method Spryker\Zed\ProductReviewCollector\Business\ProductReviewCollectorFacade::runStorageProductAbstractReviewCollector() has 2 factory calls and violates the rule "Every Facade method should have no more than one factory call.".
Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method 'runCollector' signature. That violates the rule "All bridge methods must have exactly the same signature as their interface"
